description:
We created Welmi App to help you reach your weight goals in the most comfortable way possible — no stressful fasting, extreme diets, or exhausting workouts, but gently forming conscious food habits and adjusting your nutrition.
Our mission is to be a personal nutritionist for everyone — not just a calorie counter, but a true companion to help you achieve your dream shape and maintain healthy eating habits.

Snap your meals, and we’ll gently guide you toward your fitness goals!

App features we crafted for you:
– Food & calorie scanner
Simply snap a photo of your meal, and the app will instantly log all its details.

– Personalized nutrition recommendations
Optimize your diet to feel more energetic. Discover your ideal meal sizes, food types, and the best eating schedule.

– Eating reminders
We’ll notify you when it’s the right time for a healthy meal.

– Macronutrient counter
Track your carbs, proteins, and fats with just a picture of your food.

– Daily streaks
Challenge yourself to eat healthy every day and beat your personal record!

*Analysis results require a subscription

Your healthy companions,
Welmi Team

If you have any ideas or questions, please email us at welmiappai@gmail.com

Note: We do not offer medical advice. Any and all recommendations should be viewed as suggestions, please consult with a professional and do your own research before trying a new calorie and nutrient plan.

Terms: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Live in sync with your cycle using Flo, the world’s most popular female health app. Get personalised insights and predictions on your body.

Whether you want to predict your period, get pregnant, track your pregnancy, or better understand your symptoms, Flo is your all-in-one female health partner. Join over 420 million members.

With Flo, you can:
- Keep your data safe: Flo is the first period and ovulation tracker to achieve dual ISO 27001 and ISO 27701 Certifications (aka gold standards in data protection).
- Feel more understood: Share your Flo insights via Flo for Partners to feel more connected, understood, and supported.
- Get an extra layer of protection: Anonymous Mode means no one, not even Flo, can identify you based on your health data.
- Join a supportive community: Secret Chats is where members can discuss topics and connect with others on the same journey.
- Access reliable health information: Flo collaborates with a globally recognised organisation dedicated to reproductive health and rights, ensuring trustworthy support for your health journey.

With Flo Premium, you can enjoy:
- Monthly cycle reports
- Symptom predictions and patterns
- Tailored prediction insights
- Detailed pregnancy tracking
- Full access to Flo for Partners
- A 24/7 virtual Health Assistant
- All articles, videos, and courses reviewed by 140+ health experts

New! Flo supports perimenopause:
- Know what might be perimenopause and how to tune in to your body’s changes.
- Get clarity on common perimenopause symptoms and what can help.
- Make more informed health decisions and identify what you need to feel your best.

Start tracking your cycle for free today.

Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:
https://flo.health/privacy-policy  
https://flo.health/terms-of-use 

Connect with Flo:
Web: flo.health
TikTok: @flotracker
Instagram: @flotracker

Please note: Flo is not a diagnostic tool and should not be used as a method of contraception or to facilitate conception. Predictions and insights provided by the app are intended for informational purposes only and are not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult a qualified healthcare provider for any health concerns or decisions.

Flo uses HealthKit to read menstrual cycle data and export your Flo activities to the Health app.

If you have any difficulties using the app, contact Flo via support@flo.health.

Notice of Access Permission:
Flo may request permission for:
- In-app notifications or reminders.
- Uploading photos to specific forum discussions.
- Uploading audio recordings to closed group chats.
Content sharing is entirely optional. Flo does not automatically access your content. You can select what you want to share.

Looking to build muscle and lose weight? Home Workout has got you covered!
Home workouts with no equipment, easy to follow.
Follow the tailored workout plans and expert guidance to meet a fitter, stronger you!

Home Workout app is an expertly crafted fitness app that offers a variety of workouts and workout plans suitable for everyone, from fitness beginners to experts.

With no equipment required, you can start workouts anytime, anywhere– whether you're at home, in the gym, or outdoors.

And that's not all! Home Workout also provides personalized workout plans tailored to your individual needs, whether your aim is to build muscle, lose weight, or simply stay fit.

Plus, with a real-time workout tracker, your training data will be automatically recorded and you'll never miss a single workout progress. So why wait? Time to get ready to transform your body today with Home Workout!

Home Workout prioritizes your fitness goals and workout results.
1. START ANYTIME & ANYWHERE
Our easy-to-follow workouts need no equipment. With Home Workout, just tap and start your workout plan anytime, whether at home, in the gym, or outdoors.

2. EXPERT-TAILORED WORKOUT PLAN
Gain muscle, lose weight, or just keep fit - Home Workout provides a personalized workout plan that exactly fits your goals and lifestyle. And the best part? It's fast-acting and produces long-lasting workout results.

3. WIDE RANGE OF WORKOUTS
Everyone can find the workouts they want here, whether you want to lose fat, target specific muscles, stretch your body, or just get a good mood. Home Workout has got you covered with a variety of targeted workouts.

Get Moving with Home Workout's Highlight Features:
• Personalized Workout Plan just for you: Tailored to your fitness goals & focus areas, and get faster workout results.
• 500+ Varied Workouts: A wide variety of workouts and exercises that cater to your every individual needs.
• Smart Fitness Tracker: Automatically record your workout progress and help you stay on track.

Other Can't-Miss Features:
• Pro Workout Video Guides: Work out effectively, prevent injury, and get inspired.
• Apple Health Integration: Seamlessly integrate your fitness data (calories, steps…) for better workout progress tracking
• Clear Workout Data Charts: Track weight and calorie trends for informed decisions.
• Customized Reminders: Never miss a training session or daily workout goal.
• Share with friends: Inspire and get inspired.

No Hidden Charges, say goodbye to unexpected "surprises".

Subscription Terms and Details

- The payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.
- The subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- Subscription may be managed and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to Account Settings after purchase.
- The account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.
- Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.

Track your baby's sleep, feeding, diaper changes, pumping, and mood.

Now you have an assistant on your journey to mindful parenting – trusted by 1,000,000+ moms and dads! Grow Together. Every Step of the Way.

GROWTH CRISES CALENDAR
From birth up to 2 years, a child goes through several growth and development crises. There's no need to be worried – this is a natural process during which the nervous system and brain develop, and the baby acquires new skills. However, during such periods, a child might become fussy and sleep poorly.

We display growth crises in the calendar so you won't worry: together with pediatricians we explain what's happening with the physiology, motor skills, and speech development of your child up to 105 weeks inclusive.

MEASUREMENTS OF HEIGHT, WEIGHT, AND CIRCUMFERENCES
Fix key child's growth parameters – and track how they change. Check them with the World Health Organization's standards. 

TRACKERS FOR SLEEP, FEEDING, DIAPER CHANGES, PUMPING, AND CHILD'S MOOD
Record all the important information about your child's daily schedule and routine – all in one app.

230+ DEVELOPMENTAL EXERCISES FOR EVERY DAY
Tiger on a Branch, Maracas, More Noise, Miracles – these are not the titles of colorful children's cartoons, but engaging developmental exercises that you can perform with your child every day.

JOURNAL OF PRECIOUS MOMENTS
The first smile of your little one, the first tooth, the momentous first step – keep lovely memories not just in your heart. Record them in the app to create a cute video and share it on social media and messengers with family and friends. 

SUBSCRIPTION INFORMATION

The subscription provides access to additional services in the app, becoming your daily go-to parenting resource.

- A set of exercises for each day. They match the stage of your baby's development and don't take much time. The checklist format makes it easy to keep track of completed exercises.
- Developmental norms: cognitive and psychological, speech and motor skills, teething. Checked by pediatricians and approved by the World Health Organization.

Additional information:

- Payment will be charged to your Apple account after purchase confirmation. You could check the available subscription options in the app after its installation.
- The subscription automatically renews. The renewal cost will be charged to your account 24 hours before the end of the current subscription, if auto-renewal has not been turned off.
- You can easily manage subscriptions in your Apple account settings – for example, turn off automatic subscription renewal right after purchase.

More details: https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT202039

FROM THE APP'S CREATOR 

Hello! My name is Dima, I am the father of a wonderful girl, Elli. 

When she was born, my whole world turned upside down. I learned about growth crises challenging for both the child and parents. To keep track of them, I created this app. Suddenly other parents started using it too. Today, thousands of moms and dads monitor their child's development with us – it's so inspiring, I'm so grateful. Thank you!


Growing up is not easy! But we support parents and children every day on this exciting journey.

Privacy Policy: https://sprouty.app/privacy-policy
Terms of Use: https://sprouty.app/terms-of-service

The courses designed by our fitness experts are aimed at helping you achieve your goals. You can choose a full-body workout or focus on specific body parts, making your training more targeted.

With the help of high-definition video tutorials, professional coaches will demonstrate every movement and explain the key points and details in depth. Even if you're at home, you can enjoy professional gym-level guidance. With daily updated training programs, your fitness journey will always be full of novelty and challenges.
"MuscleMaxme" Automatic Renewal Service Instructions
【"MuscleMaxme"】Enjoy multiple privileges, such as intelligent customized plans, professional assessments, and unlimited access to courses.
【Subscription Cycle】
Continuous Monthly Subscription: The subscription cycle is 1 month.
Continuous Six-Month Subscription: The subscription cycle is 6 months.
Continuous Annual Subscription: The subscription cycle is 12 months.
【Subscription Fees】
Subject to the information of in-App Purchase (iAP). For example, the continuous monthly subscription product costs 48 yuan per month, and the continuous annual subscription product costs 188 yuan per year.
【Payment】
After the user confirms the purchase and makes the payment, the amount will be deducted from the iTunes account.
【Auto-renewal】
The "Continuous Monthly / Annual" products support auto-renewal. After the purchase is confirmed, the fee will be deducted from your iTunes account. Unless you cancel the auto-renewal at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription, the subscription will be automatically renewed. Apple will automatically deduct the fee from the iTunes account within 24 hours before the subscription expires. Upon successful payment, the membership validity period will be extended by one cycle.
【Canceling Auto-renewal】
On your Apple iOS device, open the "App Store" --> Click on the Apple account avatar in the upper right corner --> Enter the "Account" section --> Click on "Subscriptions" --> Select "MuscleMaxme" and cancel the subscription.

WHOOP is the leading wearable that turns comprehensive health insights into daily action. By capturing dozens of data points every second, WHOOP delivers personalized Sleep, Strain, Recovery, Stress, and health insights—24/7. WHOOP uses those insights to provide coaching based on your body’s unique physiology and recommends everything from when to go to bed to new daily behaviors that will help you reach your goals.

If you’re new to WHOOP, you can try both the wearable and app free for 1 month. Terms and conditions apply.

WHOOP is screenless, so all your data lives in the WHOOP app—for a distraction-free focus on your health. The WHOOP app requires a WHOOP wearable.

How it works:

Healthspan*: A powerful way to quantify your age and slow your Pace of Aging. Backed by leading longevity research, it pinpoints the daily habits that impact your long-term health.

Sleep: WHOOP helps you understand how well you sleep each night by measuring your Sleep Performance. Every morning, WHOOP provides a Sleep score from 0 to 100%. Sleep Planner calculates how much sleep you need to recover, tailored to your habits, schedule, and goals. You can even set a Haptic Alarm that wakes when you're fully rested, or at a specific time, with gentle vibration. Quality sleep is essential for improving your healthspan, metabolic mental resilience, recovery, and performance.

Recovery: WHOOP lets you know how ready you are to perform by measuring your heart rate variability, resting heart rate, sleep, and respiratory rate. You'll get a daily Recovery score on a scale of 1 to 99%. When you're in the green, you're ready for strain, when you're in the yellow or red, you may want to evaluate your training program.

Strain: WHOOP does more than just track your activity–it measures cardiovascular and muscular exertion to give you the most comprehensive view of the demands you put on your body. Each day, Strain Target will provide a Strain score from 0 to 21 and recommend your optimal target exertion range based on your Recovery score.

Stress: WHOOP gives you daily insights to pinpoint your stressors, understand your physiological response, and discover techniques to help manage. Get a real-time stress score from 0-3 and, based on your score, choose a breathwork session to enhance your alertness or increase relaxation.

Behaviors: WHOOP tracks over 160+ daily habits and behaviors—like alcohol intake, medication, and more—to better understand how these behaviors impact your body. WHOOP provides weekly guidance for behavior change and helps set accountability goals with the Journal and Weekly Plan features.

WHOOP Coach: Ask questions about your health & fitness and get highly personalized, on-demand answers. Using your unique biometric data, the latest performance science, and generative AI, WHOOP Coach generates responses on everything from training plans to why you’re feeling tired.

Menstrual Cycle Insights: Go beyond period tracking to better understand your fifth vital sign and get tailored cycle-based insights.

What else you can do in the WHOOP app:

• Dig into the details: See heart rate zones, VO₂ Max, steps, and more trends over time to adjust your behaviors, training, sleep and more based on your goals.

• Join a team: Stay motivated and accountable by joining a team. Chat directly with your teammates in the app, or as a coach, see how your team's training is going.

• Apple Health: WHOOP integrates with Apple's Health app to sync activities and personalize your experience.

WHOOP provides products and services designed for general fitness and wellness purposes. WHOOP products and services are not medical devices, not intended to treat or diagnose any disease, and should not be used as a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. All content available through WHOOP products and services is for general informational purposes only.

Discover the future of health and performance.

*Some availability restrictions apply.

Track progress toward your nutrition, water, fitness, and weight loss goals with MyFitnessPal. This all-in-one food tracker and health app is like having a nutrition coach, meal planner, and food diary with you at all times.

MyFitnessPal isn’t another restrictive diet app. This is a health app to help you learn about your habits … see how you eat … make smarter food choices … find motivation & support ... and conquer your health goals.

Download and start your free 30-day Premium trial to access exclusive food tracking, fitness logging tools, and expert guidance. You’ll soon discover why MyFitnessPal is the #1 food and nutrition tracker in the U.S., a GQ 2020 Fitness Awards “Best Fitness App,” and has been featured in the New York Times, Wall Street Journal, the Today Show, and U.S. News & World Report.

SO MUCH MORE THAN A CALORIE TRACKER & FOOD JOURNAL

It’s like having a dietitian, personal trainer, and nutrition coach at your fingertips.

Log Food – Easy-to-use tools make food tracking quick and simple
Record Activity – Add workouts and steps with the fitness tracker
Customize Your Goals – Weight loss, weight gain, weight maintenance, nutrition & fitness
See Your Progress – Track at a glance, or analyze nutrition & calories in detail
Learn From a Registered Dietitian – Meal Plans customized for your target calories, whether you want to lose or gain weight—with access to our Meal Planner tool
Stay Inspired – 500+ healthy goal-focused recipes and 50 workouts keep routines fresh and fun
Connect With Community – Find friends and motivation in our active forums

A CLOSER LOOK AT FEATURES & BENEFITS

Gain Valuable Insights Through Food Logging

Discover which foods fuel you best. It’s not just a diet app, calorie counter to lose weight, or a faster way to fat loss—it’s about holding yourself accountable and understanding what you put in your body.

One of the Largest Food Databases – Track calories in over 14 million foods (including restaurant dishes)
Fast & Easy Food Tracker Tools – Type to search, add foods from your history, or quick-add calories
Bar Code & Meal Scan: Log store-bought foods and entire meals using your phone’s camera
Calorie Tracker – Automatically count calories and see your daily progress
Macro Tracker – See carbs, fat & protein breakdown by gram or percentage—no need for a separate carb tracker or keto diet app!
Nutrition Tracker and Insights – Analyze nutrition intake and set specific goals for macros, cholesterol, sodium, fiber & more
Water Logging – Easily keep track of your water intake. 

Customize Your App Experience

Choose settings that help you achieve your goals.

Custom Goals – Track calories by meal or day, set up macro goals & more
Personalized Dashboards – Pick stats you want to see at a glance
Net Carbs Mode/Carb Tracker – To simplify a low carb or keto diet, view net (not total) carbs
Protein Counter – Set your protein goals and track how much you eat during the day
Add Your Own Foods/Meal Tracker – Save recipes and meals for quick logging
Connect 50+ Apps & Devices – From fitness tracker and smartwatch apps, including the Health app
Track With Apple Watch – A calorie tracker, water tracker, and macro tracker on your watch face.

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS

MyFitnessPal is free to download and use. If you upgrade to MyFitnessPal Premium, we offer monthly & annual auto-renewing subscriptions.

Payment is charged to your credit card through your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription renews automatically unless you turn off auto-renewal in iTunes Account Settings after purchase, or cancel your subscription at least 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period.

View our full terms & conditions and privacy policy: https://www.myfitnesspal.com/privacy-and-terms

В приложении DDX Fitness для тебя собраны:

DDX Fitness Action — дополнительная подписка на онлайн-тренировки от нашего клуба  
•	Тренировки где и когда угодно — более 100 программ на любой вкус: кардио, йога, зарядка, растяжка и др.
•	Гибкость подписки — отдыхай от тренировок и продолжай с того места, на котором была пауза

В приложении DDX Fitness тебя ждёт ещё много других возможностей для улучшения здоровья и физической формы!
Скачивай приложение и присоединяйся к клубу любителей фитнеса и хорошего настроения!

Хотите похудеть без лишних хлопот? 
Забудьте про неудобные таблицы и калькуляторы калорий, которые только запутывают, тратят ваше время и нервы. С приложением "Худеем вместе" вы сможете легко отслеживать процесс похудения и сохранять мотивацию. Приложение превращает контроль питания в простой и быстрый процесс, позволяя быстро адаптироваться к диете и следить за своим прогрессом в одном месте.

Что делает "Худеем вместе" вашим лучшим помощником?

Подсчёт калорий и БЖУ:
Добавляйте продукты/блюда, и приложение рассчитает их калории, белки, жиры и углеводы. Вся информация сохраняется в удобном дневнике питания, чтобы вы могли легко отслеживать рацион.

Распознавание блюд через камеру:
Сфотографируйте блюдо, и умная камера AI определит состав и вес в граммах. Распознавание занимает секунды и значительно экономит ваше время, позволяя сосредоточиться на более важных аспектах вашего дня.

Индивидуальные рекомендации:
Приложение проанализирует ваши параметры и предоставит рекомендации по суточным нормам калорий, белков, жиров и углеводов (КБЖУ), а также подскажет, сколько воды и активности нужно для эффективного похудения.

Учёт активности:
Записывайте активности, чтобы увидеть, сколько калорий вы потратили. Это поможет вам поддерживать баланс между потреблением и расходом энергии.

Трекер воды:
Следите за количеством выпитой воды каждый день и достигайте своей нормы. Удобные напоминания помогут не забывать пить воду.

Наглядные графики прогресса:
Просматривайте изменения веса, динамику калорий и анализируйте свой прогресс. Графики помогут вам увидеть, как близко вы к своей цели.

Отчёты за любой период:
Анализируйте своё питание и активность за день, неделю или месяц. Данные можно скачать в формате PDF и использовать для анализа или консультации с тренером или врачом.

Начните с малого — достигайте большего!
Скачайте "Худеем вместе" бесплатно и сделайте первый шаг к здоровью и стройности.

iPulse helps you take full control of your heart health and overall well-being. Easily track your heart rate, blood pressure, blood sugar, blood oxygen, and weight while monitoring your daily activity and water intake. Stay informed, live healthier, and make every day count!

Measure your heart rate quickly using your phone’s camera and follow daily trends with new core indicators. iPulse now provides step-by-step guidance when abnormal heart rate patterns are detected, giving you deeper insights into your cardiovascular health.  

Key Features:
√ Heart Rate Monitoring: Measure your heart rate anytime and track progress using enhanced core metrics.  
√ Blood Oxygen Tracking: Record your blood oxygen levels and monitor trends for better health insights.  
√ Weight Tracking: Log your weight and track changes to manage your health effectively.  
√ Blood Pressure & Blood Sugar Insights: Monitor your readings and view the proportion between blood pressure, blood sugar, and blood oxygen for a complete health overview.  
√ Activity Tracking: Track steps, calories burned, and water intake to get a full picture of your daily habits.  
√ Health Insights: Learn how lifestyle choices impact your heart and overall wellness.  
√ History & Reports: Access detailed historical data to track improvements and spot patterns.  
√ Abnormal Heart Rate Guidance: Step-by-step instructions when unusual heart rate patterns are detected.

Tips for Accurate Measurements:
√ Keep your phone steady while measuring heart rate  
√ Remain calm and breathe steadily  
√ Lightly cover the back camera with your finger—no pressure needed  

iPulse integrates with HealthKit to adjust your heart rate and health metrics based on your personal parameters, making tracking seamless and personalized.

【VitalTide APP: Your Portable Health Data Manager, Making Health Management Easier】
In the fast-paced modern life, health management is often "squeezed out" by busyness—you can’t find paper and pen when you want to record your blood pressure, lack systematic data when you want to analyze blood glucose changes, and have no way to integrate multiple health indicators. To help you break through these troubles, VitalTide APP comes into being. It integrates the recording of multi-dimensional health indicators such as blood pressure, blood glucose and heart rate, and serves as your reliable health partner that you can rely on at any time with simple operations and clear data presentation.
Core Features: Comprehensive Coverage to Make Health Data "Traceable"
1. Accurate Recording: Every Measurement Has a Clear Record
● Blood Pressure Recording: Adapted to Daily Monitoring Scenarios  
Whether it is the basic blood pressure measurement after getting up in the morning, or irregular monitoring during work breaks, after exercise, etc., the APP has a convenient recording entrance. You can quickly save the data by manually entering the measured values, no complicated operations are required, and it is easy to track the fluctuation trend of blood pressure.
● Blood Glucose Recording: Distinguish Scenarios to Facilitate Diet Analysis  
For blood glucose management needs, an intuitive and easy-to-use dedicated interface is designed: it supports distinguishing between "pre-meal" and "post-meal" records to help you clearly sort out the correlation between diet and blood glucose changes.
2. Multi-Dimensional Coverage: Meet the Needs of Comprehensive Health Management
In addition to blood pressure and blood glucose, the APP also supports the recording of basic indicators such as heart rate, height and weight, and is also equipped with reference for healthy diet guidelines—from basic physiological data to daily diet suggestions, it covers your health management needs in one stop, eliminating the need to switch between multiple tools.
Disclaimer
VitalTide APP is only used as a tool for recording and organizing health data. It cannot replace medical equipment nor provide medical diagnosis or treatment advice. If you have any health discomfort, need to obtain professional medical opinions or make medical decisions, please be sure to consult a practicing doctor to ensure your health and safety.

You can choose from a variety of exercise plans for muscle groups, such as chest workout or arm workout, or for a certain goal, such as fat burning workout. You can also choose between workout for women, workout for men and get ready workouts with diet.
This fitness application beats other fitness apps, because you can keep your personal workout diary and find the best personal coach from any city for online fitness workouts and bodybuilding sessions. Share your progress, ask questions about workouts, exercises and diet – you will get competent answers. Together you can keep fit at home!

Main advantages of Fitness Online:
-	Ready workouts with a diet plan created by bodybuilding champions who act as coaches.

How does it work?
As a fitness user you can work out by developing your own weight loss program from the exercise library, use our calorie tracker and nutrition guide to create a diet plan and start working out. You can track results in the workout diary. Or choose a ready training program with a diet for your goal, like lifting weights workout, fat loss workout, etc.
You want more? Hire and work out online with a personal coach. Choose your personal trainer by budget and feedback, contact them and set sports goals. Get an invoice, pay with your bank card and start your exercises. 
Your coach will give you a workout plan with individual diet instructions, create a monthly course with a full set of exercises and meal plan to reach your goal, whether that is to get a bigger butt, lose weight, lose belly fat, build muscles, get six-pack abs, get a shredded body, get big arms or a wide chest or get fit after a pregnancy – all with fitness at home.
With a monthly course, such as a weight loss program, your coach will monitor your results for a monthly fee, give advice on your form or meal plan and adjust the exercise program if needed. 
We only invite the best fitness coaches to Fitness Online with knowledge on all working out goals, like trying to get a rounder butt at home, lose weight fast, get six-pack abs, get big arms, get a wide back, build muscles or just define your body.
